edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization
Class BasicTransformer

java.lang.Object
  edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.BasicTransformer
All Implemented Interfaces:
MultiLayerTransformer, BidirectionalTransformer, ShapeTransformer, ChangeEventSupport, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
public class BasicTransformer
extends java.lang.Object
implements MultiLayerTransformer, ShapeTransformer, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, ChangeEventSupport

A basic implementation of the MultiLayerTransformer interface that provides two Layers: VIEW and LAYOUT. It also provides ChangeEventSupport

Author:
Tom Nelson - tomnelson@dev.java.net

Constructor Summary
BasicTransformer()
          Creates an instance and notifies the view and layout transformers to listen to changes published by this instance.
